data.lyric:
[ti:Heart On Fire]
[ar:Eric Church]
[al:Heart On Fire]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Heart On Fire - Eric Church
[00:05.54]Lyrics by：Eric Church
[00:11.08]Composed by：Eric Church
[00:16.62]Roosevelt Road was too rough for my old truck
[00:24.24]Yeah she'd shake and she'd shimmy like Elvis singin' All Shook Up
[00:32.22]But you can't blame a boy for going drive it like you stole it fast
[00:40.33]With your window down brown hair blowin' look at me like that
[00:48.10]A turned up radio but the static was heavy
[00:52.79]Couldn't make out any words but take me to the levee
[00:56.46]That look on your face was full of wild desire
[01:03.76]Soakin' my soul in gas and settin' my heart on fire
[01:11.83]Heart on fire heart on fire heart on fire
[01:24.61]I don't have a single second thought that doesn't have you in it
[01:32.09]To feel those flames again I go back in a New York minute
[01:40.24]I miss the freedom of you dancing on the bow of your daddy's old boat
[01:48.09]When my spirit starts sinkin' that picture always makes it float baby
[01:56.23]We weren't old enough to drink but we d**n sure did it
[02:00.51]Hat turned backward singin' Paradise City
[02:04.60]That look on your face was full of young desire
[02:11.78]Soakin' my soul in gas and settin' my heart on fire
[02:20.02]Heart on fire
[02:58.57]Turned up radio but the static was heavy
[03:02.98]Couldn't make out any words but take me to the levee
[03:06.98]Look on your face was full of wild desire
[03:13.89]Heart on fire heart on fire heart on fire
[03:25.92]Heart on fire heart on fire heart on fire
[03:37.78]Heart on fire heart on heart on fire
[03:46.57]Roosevelt Road was too rough for my old truck
[03:54.19]Yeah she'd shake and she'd shimmy like Elvis singin' All Shook Up
[04:01.71]Heart on fire heart on fire heart on fire
data.trans:
[ti:Heart On Fire]
[ar:Eric Church]
[al:Heart On Fire]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.54]//
[00:11.08]//
[00:16.62]对我的旧卡车而言 罗斯福路太坎坷了
[00:24.24]她会疯狂摇摆 颠簸不停 就像猫王唱的《All Shook Up》
[00:32.22]但你也不能怪罪这个小伙子 把这车当做偷来的一样 开得飞快
[00:40.33]车窗打开 棕色头发 随风起舞 就那样看着我
[00:48.10]收音机开得很大声 但是杂音也很重
[00:52.79]除了“take me to the levee”这几个词 什么都听不清
[00:56.46]你脸上的表情 充满了狂野的欲望
[01:03.76]将我的灵魂浸润在汽油里 让我的心燃起火焰
[01:11.83]燃烧的心 激情无限
[01:24.61]我的脑海中每分每秒都有你的身影
[01:32.09]为了再次拥抱那种爱火 我想立马回到过去
[01:40.24]我怀念你在你父亲的旧船头上舞蹈的自由模样
[01:48.09]当我的心情变得低落时 那个画面总是能让我打起精神 宝贝
[01:56.23]我们那时还没到能喝酒的年纪 但我们还是喝了酒
[02:00.51]帽子反着戴 唱着《Paradise City》
[02:04.60]你脸上的表情 充满了青春的欲望
[02:11.78]将我的灵魂浸润在汽油里 让我的心燃起火焰
[02:20.02]燃烧的心
[02:58.57]收音机开得很大声 但是杂音也很重
[03:02.98]除了“take me to the levee”这几个词 什么都听不清
[03:06.98]你脸上的表情 充满了狂野的欲望
[03:13.89]燃烧的心 激情无限
[03:25.92]燃烧的心 激情无限
[03:37.78]燃烧的心 激情无限
[03:46.57]对我的旧卡车而言 罗斯福路太坎坷了
[03:54.19]她会疯狂摇摆 颠簸不停 就像猫王唱的《All Shook Up》
[04:01.71]燃烧的心 激情无限
